CustomField.description: This field is used for PE's to set a date when an Advocate starts on the floor so Tableau can accurately calculate their metrics. The reason this was requested is that Advocates are in training for about a month and this lag time is affecting their metrics. (BT-6859)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is for Care PE's to place an on the floor date. This date should be when the Advocate is out of training.
CustomField.label: On The Floor Date (PRC Class 1)
